Posts.Content: I took aridedex for about a year, the join pain was so bad that I have to stop taking it, later on doctor put me in femara, that was even worse, at this time I have not taking anything for about six months, will bo in tomoxifen next week.The pain in my joins did not got any better after stoping the arimedex, Good luck to you..
Posts.Title: Armimidex and side effects
